name: qPCR4vir Pages
body:
Here I'm planing to post information from some of the projects I'm working. Some are personal projects or contributions to others people projects, and others are part of my work at [FLI-INNT](http://www.fli.de/en/institutes/institut-fuer-neue-und-neuartige-tierseuchenerreger/) and particularly of my project of PhD thesis. 

# [VisualOligoDeg](https://github.com/qPCR4vir/VisualOliDeg)
Visual selection of candidate primers and probes from aligned DNA sequences. A paper in preparation.

# [Flavivirus](https://github.com/qPCR4vir/Flavivirus)
A paper in preparation.

# [HEV](https://github.com/qPCR4vir/HEV)
[Viruses. 2015 May 22;7(5):2704-26.](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/277252166_Hepatitis_E_Virus_Genotype_3_Diversity_Phylogenetic_Analysis_and_Presence_of_Subtype_3b_in_Wild_Boar_in_Europe) [doi: 10.3390/v7052704.](http://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/7/5/2704/htm)
[Hepatitis E virus genotype 3 diversity: phylogenetic analysis and presence of subtype 3b in wild boar in Europe.](https://github.com/qPCR4vir/HEV/releases/tag/Viruses-2015) 
Vina-Rodriguez A, Schlosser J, Becher D, Kaden V, Groschup MH, Eiden M.

# ThDySec
A paper in preparation.

# RobotEvo
A paper in preparation.

# [Nana C++ GUI Library](https://github.com/qPCR4vir/nana), by [Jinhao](https://github.com/cnjinhao)
I maintain the Doxygen generated documentation. Here an example of [User Documentation](http://qpcr4vir.github.io/nana-doxy/html/index.html) and a [Wiki](https://github.com/qPCR4vir/nana-docs/wiki)

## Author: Ariel Viña Rodríguez. 
[NCBI](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/myncbi/1XCkbYc4v7pk7/bibliography/41305379/public/?sort=date&direction=descending), 
[Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.de/citations?user=ikXLQakAAAAJ&hl=en), 
[Mendeley](https://www.mendeley.com/profiles/ariel-vina-rodriguez/), 
[ResearchGate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Ariel_Vina-Rodriguez2)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
